name: DAPI-GRPC
prepare_command:
pwd
git submodule update --init

pushd dapi-grpc-pod-installer
pod install
popd

mkdir -p dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/DAPI-GRPC
dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler/protoc         --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler-gRPCPlugin/grpc_objective_c_plugin         --objc_out=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/DAPI-GRPC         --grpc_out=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/DAPI-GRPC         -I platform/packages/dapi-grpc/protos/core/v0         -I dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler         platform/packages/dapi-grpc/protos/core/v0/core.proto
    
dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler/protoc         --plugin=protoc-gen-grpc=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler-gRPCPlugin/grpc_objective_c_plugin         --objc_out=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/DAPI-GRPC         --grpc_out=dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/DAPI-GRPC         -I platform/packages/dapi-grpc/protos/platform/v0         -I dapi-grpc-pod-installer/Pods/!ProtoCompiler         platform/packages/dapi-grpc/protos/platform/v0/platform.proto
